SEARCH

Class KnowledgeBase

java.lang.Object
KnowledgeBase
public class KnowledgeBase extends Object
KnowledgeBase is the memory where the data is loaded and contained. It is uses the AVL tree data structure and

  • Constructor Details

    • KnowledgeBase

      public KnowledgeBase()

  • Method Details

    • CreateBase

      public static void CreateBase()
      CreateBase calls on AVL constructor and initialises base

    • CreateRecord

      public static Record CreateRecord(String term, String stmnt, float confScore)
      Creates new Record
      Parameters:
      term - lowercase word acts as unique key in BST
      stmnt - first letter uppercase and belongs to term
      confScore - represents the validity of statement
      Returns:
      newly created Record

    • AddToInitialKB

      public static void AddToInitialKB(Record record)
      Adds a Record to the KnowledgeBase upon the first run of ReadFile(For the first textfile). It depends on the AVL Tree class insert. It will then update the instruments involved in the insertion.
      Parameters:
      record - Record to be added

    • QueryKB

      public static void QueryKB(Record record)
      Checks if a term exists in the KnowledgeBase upon the second run of ReadFile(For the query textfile). It depends on the AVL Tree class find. It will then update the instruments involved in the search.
      Parameters:
      record - Record to be found

    • FindByTerm

      public static Record FindByTerm(String term)
      Searches KB for a Record using only the unique term. Utilises the find method in the AVLTree class
      Parameters:
      term - Unique string key as search term
      Returns:
      Desired Record is returned

    • FindByTermAndStmnt

      public static Record FindByTermAndStmnt(String term, String stmnt)
      Searches KB for a Record using the unique term and it's statement. Utilises the find method in the AVLTree class
      Parameters:
      term - THe term we want to find
      stmnt - The statement we want to find
      Returns:
      Desired Record is returned

    • LineToRecord

      public static Record LineToRecord(String line)
      A line containing the term, tab, statement, tab and confidence score converted to a Record
      Parameters:
      line - The String in aforementioned format
      Returns:
      The Record using details from the line

    • QueryToRecord

      public static Record QueryToRecord(String query)
      A line containing only a term converted to a Record
      Parameters:
      query - A term
      Returns:
      Record with the query

    • ReadFile

      public static void ReadFile(String pathname, int n)
      A textfile is read using a Scanner and a loop. The lines are converted to Records and then stored in the KnowledgeBase. The first call will use AddToInitialKB in order to load the KB. The second call will use QUeryKB to compare queries to the KB.
      Parameters:
      pathname - The name of the textfile that must be in the same location as the java file (directory should work as well)
